text: I am trying to learn java in the background but only just started.

Those are good subjects to learn for a career as a developer.

I suggest you look at learning C# instead of Java. They are very similar but no games (that I know of) are written in Java. Better still, learn C# within Unity since that’s the environment that most games are made. It’s fun to use and has thousands of examples, plugins, assets etc.

I can give you some advice about the kind of projects to focus on.
